named-query.name: READ_SELLABLE_ITEMS_BY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT sellableItem FROM org.broadleafcommerce.catalog.domain.SellableItem sellableItem WHERE sellableItem.id IN (:sellableItemIds)

named-query.name: READ_SELLABLE_ITEMS_BY_CATEGORY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT sellableItem FROM org.broadleafcommerce.catalog.domain.SellableItem sellableItem WHERE sellableItem.catalogItem.id = :catalogItemId
